name: Dennis

topics.response_text: Are you going to free me or what?
Thanks for the help. We'll find our own way out.

description:
Dennis is a 124 year-old Caucasian Male.

Dennis is an elderly ghoul with weathered skin and tired eyes, bearing the scars of a life on the road. His tattered caravan clothing is stained with dust and dried blood, evidence of his recent capture. Despite his ghoulification, Dennis maintains a posture that speaks of his former life as a seasoned traveler.

Dennis's Personality: Dennis is resilient but fearful, having endured the harsh realities of the wasteland both before and after his transformation. He speaks with a weary tone, often looking for the silver lining in his dire situation. While he misses the freedom of the open road, he remains hopeful that someone will eventually free him and his fellow prisoners.

Dennis's Backstory: Born in 2057, Dennis lived through the Great War as a young adult. Before ghoulification, he worked as a caravan guard, traveling extensively across the Mojave Wasteland. Around 2150, during a raider attack on a caravan he was protecting, Dennis was exposed to significant radiation, causing his transformation into a ghoul. Despite this, he continued his caravan life for decades, becoming one of the most respected ghoul travelers in the region. In 2280, Dennis and his caravan were ambushed by the Fiends near Vault 3. Most of his companions were killed, and Dennis was taken prisoner, along with Rick Lancer and Rachael.
